definition: sail/Taiwan pr. [fan2], except 帆布[fan1 bu4] canvas

sentences.english: This ship model is a miniature copy of a life-sized Arab dhow called the Sohar.
sentences.chinese: 這是名爲“蘇哈爾”的阿拉伯帆船模型。

sentences.english: The boat had been brought to a beach at Willoughby Spit in Norfolk, Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 這艘帆船被掛到了弗吉尼亞州諾福克的一處海灘上。

sentences.english: If necessary, get a separate survey of the engine of a larger sailboat.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要，對大型帆船的引擎進行單獨的檢驗。

sentences.english: In the harbor sailboats are easily cruising on the blue and peaceful water.
sentences.chinese: 海港中，帆船在湛藍而平靜的海面上飄來飄去。

sentences.english: I can see a windjammer on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 我看到海平線上有一艘大帆船。

sentences.english: I have sailed 333 miles in the Chicago Mackinac Regatta Race .
sentences.chinese: 我已航行三百三十三英里在芝加哥麥基諾帆船賽。

sentences.english: A wave of grief engulfed them.
sentences.chinese: 洶湧的大海吞沒了那艘小機帆船。

sentences.english: One cat plays the harmonica as the other cats ride on their sailboat.Another cat brought a net.
sentences.chinese: 在其他貓乘上帆船時，一隻貓吹着口琴。

sentences.english: For a slightly more active, and regal, pursuit, try sailing.
sentences.chinese: 如果要稍微更有活力，更豪華，嘗試帆船吧。

sentences.english: The Cutty Sark was one of the fastest sailing ships that has ever been built.
sentences.chinese: 卡帝薩克號是帆船建造史上最快的一艘帆船。

sentences.english: The Cutty Sark was one of the fastest sailing ships that has ever been built.
sentences.chinese: 卡帝薩克號是帆船建造史上最快的一艘帆船。

sentences.english: I've recently started to crew for a sailboat and occasionally take part in offshore races.
sentences.chinese: 我最近開始組建一支帆船隊，並偶爾參加近海比賽。

sentences.english: In such a strong wind the sailboat kept heeling to the left.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的大風中帆船保持向左傾斜。

sentences.english: The depth of a boat in the water, measured from the waterline to the lowest section of the keel.
sentences.chinese: 帆船進入水的深度，從水平面到龍骨最低處測量。

sentences.english: Sail Blind teams have competed throughout the world in regattas.
sentences.chinese: 各盲人帆船賽隊在世界各國的帆船賽事大展風采。
